product_name: Finish Line Speed Degreaser - 17 oz. Aerosol
long_description: This super-duty cleaning formula melts the crap away--uses the very latest of two impressive advances in cleaning chemistry! Strips the ugliest of stuff right off, including the toughest of brake rotor surface grime. Melts and rinses contaminants right off, then dries fast and complete with no oily residue left behind. Speed Clean evaporates away, and because Speed Clean also displaces water you're left with a squeaky clean, residue-free, dry surface. Completely Federally-VOC / California Air Regulatory Board compliant, (plus, of course, safe on the user and environment). Ozone-safe aerosol can.
short_description: This super-duty cleaning formula melts the crap away--uses the very latest of two impressive advances in cleaning chemistry!
